mapper.sql: ParkId, ParkName, DoorId, DoorName, SentryTrueName, PassTrueName, PassDate, Temperature,Reason,IsIn,Admit
mapper.select:
select COUNT(1) from (SELECT t1.epidemic_id,t1.PassTrueName,t1.PassDate FROM biz_pass_record as t1 left join sys_user t2 on t1.PassUserId = t2.id where t2.PhoneNumber is not NULL and t2.PhoneNumber!='undefined') b left JOIN biz_epidemic a on a.id = b.epidemic_id
AND a.company LIKE CONCAT('%', #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND a.department LIKE CONCAT('%', #{department,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND b.PassTrueName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{PassTrueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND b.PassDate >= #{startTime} and t1.PassDate <= #{endTime}
